enableSpellCardSignDisplay: Display card Signs (i.e. War Sign, Blue Sign)
enableAlternativeMarisaCardImage: Use Alternative Portrait for Marisa Cards (Only for derivatives of "Friend's Help")
usePackMasterStyleMarisaCards: Use Pack Master styled Marisa cards (requires restarting)
enableShanghaiDollEventForOtherCharacter: Enable Shanghai Doll event for other characters
